channel.title: Stock offering on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Stock offering on FinanClub

item.title: GERN
item.description: score:69 Chances: Geron Corporation’s pipeline candidate, imetelstat, received FDA Committee backing for the treatment of transfusion-dependent anemia in adult patients with low-to-intermediate-1 risk myelodysplastic syndromes, indicating potential for future market approval. Shares of Geron Corporation (GERN) soar after positive news from the FDA’s Oncologic Drugs Advisory Committee, showing investor optimism in the company’s potential drug approvals.

item.title: CNM
item.description: score:-11 Chances: Core & Main, Inc. has seen substantial growth in its share price, with over a 100% increase this year. The company has announced multiple acquisitions and agreements to expand its product offerings and market reach. Institutions have substantial holdings in Core & Main, indicating significant influence over the company’s direction and performance.

item.title: ARWR
item.description: score:114 Chances: The company has successfully priced an underwritten registered offering, indicating strong investor interest and potential for significant capital influx.
